page.title: 02SUNDAY FOR A WAVERTON BOY
page.content: It's Sunday.I wake at 8-00 a.m, wash, dress, breakfast on bacon butties and feed my pet rabbit.Then I pack my Dads breakfast and take it to him to eat between services.I change into my choir robes,light the altar candles, then put up the hymn boards.The service starts at 10-15 a.m..While we have our service there is a Sunday School for the young children. Afterwards adults meet for refreshments in the Village Hall,while children play games in the playground. At noon Dad and I go to Christleton Mill Stores for the Sunday papers. Back at home Julie, my sister, and Mum prepare our roast dinner.During the afternoon I play with my friends,but at 6-00p.m. I get ready to go into church for Evensong with sermon at 6-30p.m..When I get back home I have a bath and go to bed.
